alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Suffolk; Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 7:25PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of , the City of Norfolk, the City of Chesapeake, the City of Portsmouth, the southeastern City of Suffolk and the northwestern City of Virginia Beach through 815 PM EDT... At 724 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Downtown Suffolk, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bowers Hill around 730 PM EDT. Deep Creek, Chesapeake and Western Branch around 735 PM EDT. Churchland and Cradock around 740 PM EDT. Downtown Norfolk, Norfolk State University, Downtown Portsmouth, Old Dominion University, Portsmouth and Ghent around 745 PM EDT. Regent University, Kempsville, Norview and Norfolk NAS around 750 PM EDT. Virginia Wesleyan University, Ocean View, Norfolk and Norfolk International around 755 PM EDT. Virginia Beach around 810 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include South Norfolk, Portlock, Princess Anne Plaza, Huntersville, Herberts Corner, Magnolia, Greenbrier, Bayside, Oceana and Wilroy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern North Carolina...and southeastern Virginia.

area.areaDesc: Chesapeake; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Suffolk; Virginia Beach
